Title: Shintaisou: Kari
Description: ['A P.E. teacher, Nikusuke, happened to obtain a brief of "Dark Rhythmic Gymnastics Project". It is a competition where the players compete with others their lewdness. Following the project, Nikusuke looked for the players with Tomomi, a granddaughter of the board chairman. Their first game was Miku. Tomomi deceived innocent Miku, and she invited Miku out at night.']
Characters: ['Shirakawa, Tomomi', 'Doguro, Nikusuke', 'Haneoka, Miku', 'Aizawa, Yuu', 'Morishita, Kozue', 'Sakurai, Wakana', 'Senge, Madoka']
Staff: [['Murakami, Teruaki', 'Director, Storyboard, Character Design, Animation Director'], ['Momoi, Osamu', 'Script'], ['Panda House', 'Original Creator']]
